reviews.review:
o cs pode ser duro as vezes, mas se você tem amor, ódio e paixão pelo fps, esse é o jogo perfeito pra você pois...
quereno ou não passará raiva com estrangeiros no seu time quando  menos esperar, se acha que a VALVE liga pra isso, esta enganado, Ela só quer seu dinheiro... Então resta pra nós BRASILEIROS fazer HISTÓRIA nesse jogo e bater o P4U na mesa  mostrar realmente quem manda N3SSA PORR4.! eh isto! G? 3? X? MIBR ATE O FIM PORRAAAAAAAAAAA

Oyun eskiden daha güzeldi ama hileler gelince oyun sıkmaya başladı. Hile probleminin çözülmesi gerek.

Играешь хорошо- читер

Honestly, best Game I've ever played!
Value could probably be more transparent and proactive. Other then that, keep up the good work! :)

度が過ぎるほど、ゲームをお勧めした皆様に遊びにいたします。※..

He vendido la dentadura de mi abuela para comprarme una skin del ak muy fachera la verdad
Худшая игра, в каждой игре попадаются игроки с читами
Addictive af. Please don't play in college if you want a good grade.

[*] Skins are too expensive
[*] Quite a lot of hackers
[*] Gameplay is fun and challenging
[*] There is a lot to learn about tactics, shooting properly and movement
[*] A lot of different community servers where you can explore various gamemodes - personally my favorite type of community servers are the KZ and Surf ones

[b] I recommend CS:GO, it is an OG FPS, which you most definitely need to try out if you like constant action, challenge, tactics. There is always something new in this game that you can learn to improve your skills.  [/b]
Kurwa 1000 godzin mam fajna gra XD
GOOD GAME FULL OF CHEATERS I LOVE IT STILL I AM BETTER THAN THEM
Needs more dance emotes and a blue haired ninja skin. Will not play again until these are added. You’ve lost a customer unless my demands are met.

the game is good, but there are many toxic, unskillful commentators about the game of other "players", if it were not for prime status, the game would not exist because too many people cheat because they want to value that they play cheats and then the match is lost because of such the child cannot play cleanly
1.6 dan GO' ya tam 14 sene. Herkes hile olsa yine oynarım.
игра нормальная хорошая, c хорошей графикой но вот незадача физика прицела если стрелять ровно ты не попадаешь если стрелять на сантиметр 2 ты попадешь.
Very toxic community and dead game. Would recommend.
Oyun mükemmel ancak hile olayları kaldırılırsa çok daha oynanabilir ve insanların kendini geliştirebileceği bir oyun olur

This game is very bad, very very bad. Guns feel like crap and literally shoot wherever they want, its filled with hackers and they never get banned. if you want to play this game, literally download r6 siege. it has less way less hackers, the guns feel and work far better and its actually consistent. Also my gun has sights, let me use them you idiots.  Valve should really pull their fingers out.
Dogshit monkey game, fix your mmr, filled with aimgodx's
This game is worse than getting evicted during the pandemic

Es un juego bastante decente, lo que mas me gusta es que es entrar a un mm e instantaneamente subirme el ego con los onvres que me simpean jajaja. 
Hay muchos mancos, mas de los que deberia haber en un tactical shooter, fps, 5v5 de este calibre. Pero por lo menos me dicen que soy hermosa.
Una lastima los toxicos y hackers, pero tambien los 1 tapeo xd
Это просто жар попки твоей, если ты скачал эту игру.

枕头里藏满了发霉的梦,好友列表里塞满了电竞梦发霉的人.
大胆点突破,你没那么多观众。
有时我会怀疑我们输了16局,还是输了1局,重复了16次.
错过一个过点的人,可能这局都要输,错过一个深爱的人,可能就是一辈子.
爱而不得的时候,听到的所有脚步声都像是要刀自己.
希望你在丧失表达欲的时候,能有人温柔的发你一把ak.
